body.p:
i write to tell you that janey maquire that is nanc Nancy brothers brother's wife has been here and tells me awfull awful things of the wreched wretched creature she has had twins one is dead the other is living and the children is sent out to beg by the day and her brother the one to the court house wants to get the 3 children away from her and have them put in some institution) what i want you to doo do Walter dear is this to write a letter to James Cornell for him to intercede in getting them from her she drinks and every thing else thats that's bad) tell justice cornellCornell for Andrew s Andrew's sake for heavens s heaven's sake to doo do what he can) i wish you would say to him that the home of the friendless in new yorkNew York is a good institution half orphan children can be got in there without pay) janeyJaney says if they are put in the brooklyn Brooklyn institution they have to pay something that eddward maquireEdward McClure
that is the wretches wretch's brother will pay for two if we will pay for one but they i think if the proper way it taken can be got in new yorkNew York she said she couldent couldn't tell me how bad things were that if the children can be got away from her they never will countenance her she said her brother Jim that is another brother of nancee Nancy would have shot her he was so inbitter embittered EdwarEdward is the one with one arm keeps the new court house and his wife Janey said to day it affected him so that it made him sick the money you left for the children and her we could never find her Edd went to look for her and she had moovedmoved) i told Janey to day about the money and for her to take it and get something for them she said she would come here again soon that it was no use to get any thing now nanceNance pawns every thing i hope you will write to cornellCornell walterWalter
i am midlingmiddling well only lame

postscript.p: the maquiresMaquires is very respectable men
